org.apache.hadoop.hbase.replication

Interface WALEntryFilter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseWALEntryFilter, ChainWALEntryFilter, NamespaceTableCfWALEntryFilter, RegionReplicaReplicationEndpoint.SkipReplayedEditsFilter, ScopeWALEntryFilter, SystemTableWALEntryFilter

    @InterfaceAudience.LimitedPrivate(value="Replication")
public interface WALEntryFilter
    A Filter for WAL entries before being sent over to replication. Multiple filters might be chained together using ChainWALEntryFilter.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      WAL.Entry filter(WAL.Entry entry)
      Applies the filter, possibly returning a different Entry instance.

    • Method Detail

      • filter

        WAL.Entry filter(WAL.Entry entry)
        Applies the filter, possibly returning a different Entry instance. If null is returned, the entry will be skipped.
        Parameters:
        entry - Entry to filter
        Returns:
        a (possibly modified) Entry to use. Returning null or an entry with no cells will cause the entry to be skipped for replication.
